categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Kaldeni was a female Human who served as a corporal in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, she was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.

Corporal Kaldeni first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Modification Commendations vendor for the Empire on Taris. She was later removed from the game in a restructuring of the commendation system.
